pages.text: The $(major)Dragon's Breath$(0) Gene allows players to $(minor)shoot a dragon fireball$(0) when the Dragon's Breath key (currently bound to $(k:key.geneticsresequenced.dragons_breath)) is used.$(br2)This has a configurable cooldown, with the default being 15 seconds.$(br2)This Gene $(bad)cannot be given to mobs$(0).
By default, you can get this gene from the following mobs:$(br)$(li)Ender Dragon
